== What is Ubuntu Kylin ? ==

The objective of the Ubuntu Kylin project is to create a variant of Ubuntu that is more suitable for previous Windows users all over the world. We are committed to provide you with a simpler and more enjoyable experience out-of-the-box. For instance, by providing UKUI Desktop Environment which provide a ‘familiar Windows-style layout’ to windows. Ubuntu Kylin has been a formal member of the Ubuntu family, since Ubuntu Kylin 13.04. Now, we are working on 19.04.

== What's new in Ubuntu Kylin 19.04 ==

Beijing 28th March 2019: Ubuntu Kylin Team releases Ubuntu Kylin 19.04 beta officially, updating system kernel, desktop environment and many other bug-fixes. In the mean time, Ubuntu 19.04/ Kubuntu 19.04/ Lubuntu 19.04 /Ubuntu Mate 19.04 and so on are releasing today.

=== Linux Kernel ===

Linux Kernel 5.0.0-7

=== Desktop Environment ===

* menu
1. Add timed shutdown.
2. New transparent style.

* panel
1. Add the function to merge similar windows.

* Peony(file manager)
1. Add function to preview text, doc and other files.

* Indicator
1. Add transparent style.
